content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Metal Gear Solid® Portable Ops is the action game from Hideo Kojima’s legendary Metal Gear Solid® series that redefined the steal action genre on the PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system. With an original storyline that follows the events of Metal Gear Solid® 3: Snake Eater and innovative online gameplay that lets gamers recruit their own comrades, Metal Gear Solid® Portable Ops offers players a Metal Gear experience unlike any other.

• An original Metal Gear action game with an extended storyline taking place after the events of MGS3 Snake Eater for the PSP® system
• High production values with cinematic cut scenes and voiceovers
• Full game voiceovers and cut scenes drawn by renown comic artist Ashley Wood
• Robust online multiplayer gameplay

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
